@DeterminedDiner Oh no, that sounds really scary Lucy. I remember a flight as a kid when we tried to land in a storm, but in the end had to divert. Lots of sudden drops then too. Scary stuff.. but also shows how robust planes actually are. Hope you feel better soon! x
@SavlaFaire @DeterminedDiner I've also resisted the calls of the Kindle. A proper book for me, anytime. 📖

As its #NationalWritingDay, here's my go at 'flash-fiction' - a super-short dystopian tale starring a kickass clone trying to save the world from evil food-tech corporations.. 🌍🏃‍♀️ #fiction #writeaway ➡️https://t.co/ohj16tKv9G https://t.co/ig68nRLZr5

It's #NationalWritingDay - so here's a genre-bending piece I wrote that combines a restaurant review + some dystopian eco flash-fiction starring a kickass clone trying to save the world.🌍🏃‍♀️ (does it work? who knows! but hope you enjoy the ride..) ➡️https://t.co/ohj16tKv9G https://t.co/NCVPDp0qHk

@le_petit_oeuf Know the feeling! Hope at least you get a tasty breakfast in, and that you catch-up on sleep sometime soon! 😴

Lots of great dishes @TasteofLondon this year. Here some of my favourites.. - @SmokeandSaltLDN beef heart, chimchurri + gorgonzola - #LadiesOfRestaurants lamb in betel-nut leaves - @BombayBustle samosa papri chaat - @jcochranchef buttermilk fried chicken #tasteoflondon https://t.co/CrNysBL3UV

A real highlight for me was being invited for iftar by my friend @shahnazahsan. Being Jewish, I'm used to Yom Kippur post-fast feasting, but felt particularly honoured to join in the Ramadan celebrations. (She also happens to be an amazing cook!) #Ramadan #EidMubarak #EidulFitr https://t.co/NJDy0ONgvP
